short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attach your phone photos in Gmail instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attach Phone Photos from your Desktop Gmail instantly. Writing an email on your desktop but got some new photos you want to attach quickly? EzAttach is the perfect solution. No need to email photos to yourself first or having to switch to your phone. Access your phone photos directly from Gmail. Install EzAttach app on your Android phone and attach away!

Why EzAttach?
• Photos available in Gmail as soon as you snap them on your phone. No waiting.
• Keeps your photos synced 24/7, even when the app is not running on your phone.
• Attach as inline or as file attachment on the fly.
• Free EzAttach Android App (iOS version coming soon).
